sentences.english: I would like to have a fried diced chicken with peanuts, rice and soup.
sentences.chinese: 我要一个宫保鸡丁，要米饭，还有一份汤。

sentences.english: It’s a great complement to rice dishes, soups and pasta.
sentences.chinese: 是做米饭，煮汤，做面食的好作料。

sentences.english: I would rather have noodles than rice.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿吃面条也不吃米饭。

sentences.english: It is polite and proper to lift small bowls of rice or soup when you eat.
sentences.chinese: 当你吃小碗米饭或汤时，把它端起来是礼貌和适当的。

sentences.english: Do you like rice or noodles?
Grandma cooked rice-soup and the family hope you grow up fast.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶米饭，汤和家庭的希望你长大了快。

sentences.english: It is usually served with rice or with noodles.
sentences.chinese: 肉骨茶通常用来搭配米饭或面条。

sentences.english: “Idiot, ” I say, my mouth full of rice.
sentences.chinese: “白痴，”我说，我的嘴里满是米饭。

sentences.english: "But everyone can see that you enjoyed the smell of my fried fish with your rice, " argued the woman.
sentences.chinese: 可人人都能看见你就着我的煎鱼的气味吃了米饭。

sentences.english: You should eat up every grains of rice in your bowl.
sentences.chinese: 你应将碗中的米饭吃得一粒不剩。

sentences.english: Glutinous rice and then funnel flat little dumplings are deflated too much smoke there.
sentences.chinese: 糯米饭然后漏斗平，小饺子是瘪的，有太多的烟。

sentences.english: A pot of yellow rice with fish. Do you want some?
sentences.chinese: 有锅鱼煮黄米饭。要吃点吗？

sentences.english: Serve risotto topped with calamari and drizzled with any remaining lemon vinaigrette.
sentences.chinese: 装盆时在米饭旁放上鱿鱼，并淋上剩余的柠檬香料汁。

sentences.english: Since you don' t use any utensils to eat, you can use this bread to scoop up the curry or rice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用面包来盛咖喱粉和米饭而省去了器皿。

sentences.english: She emptied more than half the rice into his bowl.
sentences.chinese: 她把大半碗米饭拨到他的碗里。

definition: plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
